text:
[redacted_name]fica enojado com a forma que o outro fala do amigo “Vc tá falando como se fossem namorados” as palavras saem da boca de [redacted_name] antes de ele sequer ter as processado, então quando ele se apercebe do que ele próprio disse e sobre a possibilidade de ele estar certo, fica furioso, agarrando em pope e o arrastando para o banheiro, ele pressiona as costas do outro contra a parede “É isso? Vc e ele namoram? …… Já transaram?” Ele aperta o pescoço de [redacted_name] ao imaginar [redacted_name] tocando nele.
“Uhm? O que vc tá falando? Isso não é da sua conta. Porquê que vc se importa?!” [redacted_name]diz tentando se livrar das mãos do maior e do desconforto que a parede provocava em suas costas
[redacted_name] aperta mais o pescoço de [redacted_name] “RESPONDE CARALHO” ele diz gritando
“Não…..não…. Eu nunca me envolvi com o[redacted_name] de nenhuma forma” o mais escuro responde
trans:
[redacted_name] feels a wave of disgust at the way the other speaks about his friend. "You're talking like you're dating," he exclaims before he even processes the words. The realization of what he just said, and the possibility that he might be right, makes him furious. Without thinking, he grabs Pope and drags him into the bathroom, pressing him against the wall. "Is that it? Are you dating? .... Have you slept with him yet?" his grip tightens around [redacted_name]'s neck as he pictures [redacted_name] touching him.
"Huh? What are you talking about? That's none of your business. Why do you even care?!" [redacted_name] replies, trying to escape the bigger boy's grip and the discomfort of the wall against his back.
[redacted_name] tightens his hold on [redacted_name]'s neck "ANSWER ME, DAMMIT!" he shouts.
"No... No... I've never hooked up with [redacted_name] in any way!" the darker one answers
